summary: The Renaissance was a time in Europe from the 15th to 16th centuries when people wanted to learn from and improve upon the past, especially ancient Greece and Rome. It started in Italy and spread across Europe, affecting art, architecture, politics, and science. This period saw great artists like Leonardo da Vinci and Michelangelo, who were very knowledgeable in many areas, earning them the title "Renaissance men." The Renaissance also brought changes in how people thought, learned, and did business.
title: Renaissance
